dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5404 IH: Make America Healthy Again Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14212, relating to establishing the President’s Make America Healthy Again Commission.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Make America Healthy Again Act of 2025.
Executive Order 14212 (90 Fed. Reg. 9833; relating to establishing the President’s Make America Healthy Again Commission) shall have the force and effect of law.
